name: Revery Rebirth
storyline: The land of Caarmellum is a sprawling land with several different biomes. To the East, we have Two-Gates Kingdom with it’s tall mountains and lush, dense forests. To the far West, there’s the Scepter of Sinsa, an arid land that is home to ruby red vegetation. There’s the cold, snowy island of Rin to the North and sunny, windy Amour de Chant just below it. In Revery Rebirth, you’ll travel across many of these places, visiting their locals, the shops, watch concerts and much more.
summary:
'Revery Rebirth' is the story of a musician just finishing their lessons on a remote island. However, once returning to the main land, things aren't as peaceful as they were before. 
 
A well trained musician in the land of Caarmellum is able to harness the elements of the world with song. You'll be able set fire with brass, change the ground beneath you with drums and several other possibilities. Combine these skills with other musicians you meet along the way and help bring peace back to the land.
